description: Detects suspicious sub processes of web server processes Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Web applications that invoke Linux command line tools
name: Linux Webshell Indicators
query: (process.executable:(*\/whoami OR *\/ifconfig OR *\/usr\/bin\/ip OR *\/bin\/uname) AND (process.parent.executable:(*\/httpd OR *\/lighttpd OR *\/nginx OR *\/apache2 OR *\/node) OR (process.parent.command_line:*\/bin\/java* AND process.parent.command_line:*tomcat*)))
